name: Cisco | IOSXR | Network | BFD | Session Down (SYSLOG)
description: %L2-BFD-6-SESSION_STATE_DOWN : BFD session to neighbor 192.168.1.1 on interface GigabitEthernet0/1/0/19 has gone down. Reason: Echo function failed

patterns.value_re: %L2-BFD-6-SESSION_STATE_DOWN : BFD session to neighbor (?P<peer>\S+) on interface (?P<interface>\S+) has gone down. Reason: (?P<reason>.+)$
